lead_paragraph: The photographer Julie McGuire captured images of the carriage horses of Central Park, finding a sureness of step amid the chaos of the city and the changes coming to their industry.

headline.main: Central Park Carriage Horses, Steady as They Go

snippet: The photographer Julie McGuire captured images of the carriage horses of Central Park, finding a sureness of step amid the chaos of the city and the changes coming to their industry.
abstract: Photographer Julie McGuire documents New York City carriage-horse industry through eyes of stoic beasts who pull old-style transports; Mayor Bill de Blasio's plans to scale down industry and move horses to Central Park is expected to limit their presence around Manhattan.
